summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, sent on November 17, 2021, providing an outline for an upcoming conversation. The email references jury selection and suggests coordination on introductory material for a call.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is providing an outline for a conversation and mentions jury selection.

events.title: Email Correspondence Regarding Case Discussion
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email with an outline for a conversation, referencing jury selection and planning for introductory discussion material.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 17, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email references an ongoing jury selection process, indicating active legal proceedings related to the Epstein case at that time.
The correspondence is professional planning communication regarding a conversation, showing coordination among legal officials.
The sender's office is located at 1 Saint Andrews Plaza in New York City, which is the address for the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
